subject: Olympic Games (2018)
Curling
Skiing
Snowboarding
Speedskating
Ice Skating
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The events — curling mixed doubles, mass start speed skating, an Alpine skiing event between nations and snowboard big air — have female participation and youth appeal in mind.
snippet: The events — curling mixed doubles, mass start speed skating, an Alpine skiing event between nations and snowboard big air — have female participation and youth appeal in mind.
